plugins.name: Applink
plugins.description: Applink is a simple yet effective plugin that enhances collaboration in Figma by allowing users to copy and share local URLs instead of the standard Figma.com links. This ensures seamless navigation directly from the Figma app to the app, eliminating the detour through a browser. Perfect for teams, Applink streamlines the sharing process by saving time and simplifying workflows.
plugins.tagline: Effortless link sharing, straight from app to app

117130.name: Applink

plugins.name: Session Marker
plugins.description:
Session Maker Like in the Skate video game series. Leave a work space and return without bounds. In my personal workflow I noticed that being able to navigate to a single component from a instance wasn't enough and often left me forgetting where i came from.


UI updates planned early 25" - This is a initial release for testing and feedback
plugins.tagline: Session Maker Like in the Skate video game series.

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

113549.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
113549.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: Figma2mos.
plugins.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
plugins.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

105007.name: Figma2mos.
105007.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
105007.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

plugins.name: Multiclip
plugins.description:
✨ What's New in v1.0

✅ Copy multiple text elements anywhere in Figma.

✅ Select entire sections or frames to copy all text elements at once.

✅ Saved items remain available even after closing the plugin.

✅ Copy previous text to clipboard when replacing.

✅ Quickly paste saved text into selected text layers or create a new text node if none is selected.

✅ Easily remove all stored items when needed.

✅ A clean and simple interface for managing copied text efficiently.


🛠 How It Works

✅ Select text layers and click "Copy" to add them to your clipboard.

✅ Manage clipboard history (up to 10 items).

✅ Click "Paste" to insert saved text into selected text layers.


📌 Upcoming Features

🔹 Copy, save, and images or illustrations to clipboard.

🔹 Categorize copied items.

🔹 Custom paste settings.
plugins.tagline: Copy multiple texts to clipboard seamlessly

120658.description:

120658.release_notes:
- Copy button bug fixed
- Duplicate copies bug fixed
120658.tagline: Copy multiple texts to clipboard seamlessly

plugins.name: AntiSpacer
plugins.description:
Start the plugin and press the button to apply it to each text node in project


Sometimes there are many extra spaces in text. Even if not, it's better to be sure that there are none of them, especially if removing them takes only one click!
plugins.tagline: This plugin allows you to remove extra spaces in the whole document in one click!

plugins.name: Halftone Converter
plugins.description:
This tool transforms any selected image into a customizable halftone effect, using individual ellipse layers to simulate tonal shading. You can control:


•Dot Size – Adjust the diameter of each dot to refine visual granularity

•Dot Density – Increase or decrease how many dots are used to represent the image


Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It’s ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
plugins.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

137209.name: Halftone Converter
137209.description:
This tool transforms any selected image into a customizable halftone effect, using individual ellipse layers to simulate tonal shading. You can control:


•Dot Size – Adjust the diameter of each dot to refine visual granularity

•Dot Density – Increase or decrease how many dots are used to represent the image


Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It’s ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
137209.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

plugins.name: Color Palette Extractor
plugins.description:
Easily audit and document your color palette. This plugin scans any selection, extracts all solid colors and gradients, and lists them with their official Variable or Style name.

Get instant access to HEX (with alpha), RGBA and HLS codes, and export the entire list to an HTML file, perfect for creating style guides and improving developer handoff.
plugins.tagline: Extracts colors, codes, and names from your selection. Lets you export the palette to HTML

136609.name: Color Palette Extractor
136609.description:
Easily audit and document your color palette. This plugin scans any selection, extracts all solid colors and gradients, and lists them with their official Variable or Style name.

Get instant access to HEX (with alpha), RGBA and HLS codes, and export the entire list to an HTML file, perfect for creating style guides and improving developer handoff.
136609.tagline: Extracts colors, codes, and names from your selection. Lets you export the palette to HTML

plugins.name: Slide Auto-Numbering by Works.
plugins.description:
Slide Auto-Numbering


This plugin automatically numbers your Figma Slides. Wherever a TEXT layer named “page number” exists, it will be overwritten with the correct slide index (1, 2, 3, …).


How to use:

• Ensure each slide has a TEXT layer named “page number.”

• Run the plugin (Plugins → Development → Slide Auto-Numbering → Run).

• The plugin will number the slides linearly in the order provided by Figma Slides.
plugins.tagline: Auto-number your slides ;)

135716.name: Slide Auto-Numbering by Works.
135716.description:
Slide Auto-Numbering


This plugin automatically numbers your Figma Slides. Wherever a TEXT layer named “page number” exists, it will be overwritten with the correct slide index (1, 2, 3, …).


How to use:

• Ensure each slide has a TEXT layer named “page number.”

• Run the plugin (Plugins → Development → Slide Auto-Numbering → Run).

• The plugin will number the slides linearly in the order provided by Figma Slides.
135716.release_notes: This plugin is for only for Figma Slides, the Figma Design option is removed to avoid confusion.

  2. check the layer name preview before applying changes

plugins.tagline: Rename layers by adding prefix/sufix and creating your own presets.

134927.description:

plugins.name: Icon Scaler
plugins.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
plugins.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

134540.name: Icon Scaler
134540.description:
ICON SCALER :

This plugin lets you scale one or multiple selected icons into multiple standard sizes in a single click — while preserving all their styles, groups, layers, strokes, and fills. No flattening. No distortion.


But that’s not all — It also automatically generates a variable component for each icon, so you can easily manage different icon sizes using Figma's powerful component properties.


Whether you’re preparing icon sets for design systems, exports, or different platform needs, this plugin automates the repetitive work — and gives you perfect consistency every time.


KEY FEATURES:

✅ Scale multiple icons at once into multiple sizes

✅ Preserves structure — no flattening or vector merging

✅ Creates a variable component with size modes for each icon

✅ UI with smart “chip-style” size selection + custom size support

✅ Neatly arranged output inside a new frame, ready to use or export
134540.tagline: Create Icon Size Range and components instantly

plugins.name: Select by Style
plugins.description:
Select by Style makes it easy to find and select all elements on your page that share the same text or colour styling.


Perfect for designers who need to quickly audit styles, make bulk changes, or ensure consistency across their designs. Save time by selecting multiple elements at once instead of hunting them down individually.


What it does:

The plugin automatically scans your current page and organises all text styles and colour styles into easy-to-browse tables. Simply click on any style to instantly select all elements using that style across your page.


How to use it:

  1. Open the plugin to see all styles detected on your current page
  2. Browse the Text tab to see text styles with font details, sizes, and weights
  3. Browse the Colour tab to see colour styles with hex codes and opacity
  4. Use the search bar to quickly find specific styles by name, font, or colour
  5. Click any style row to select all elements using that style
  6. Use the Refresh button when you add new content to the page


Key features:

  1. Instant selection: Click once to select all elements with the same style
  2. Smart organisation: Separate tabs for text and colour styles with detailed information
  3. Search & filter: Quickly find styles by typing in the search box
  4. Library detection: See which styles are local vs. from external libraries
  5. Auto-refresh: Detects when you switch pages or add significant new content
  6. Live updates: Automatically updates when you change styles on selected elements


How are we doing? We're always working to make this plugin better and would genuinely appreciate hearing about your experience - and suggestions for enhancement.
plugins.tagline: Quickly select all elements using the same style

136153.name: Select by Style
136153.description:

Perfect for designers who need to quickly audit styles, make bulk changes, or ensure consistency across their designs. Save time by selecting multiple elements at once instead of hunting them down individually.

plugins.name: Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered) - Beta
plugins.description:
🏰 พ่อขุนเช็ก - ตัวช่วยเช็กภาษาไทยสุดแม่น ที่ทำให้การทำงานง่าย สนุก และดูโปรฯ กว่าเดิม!


✨ จุดเด่นของพ่อขุนเช็ก

* เช็กภาษาไทยแม่นยำระดับโปร : ใช้ AI ตรวจสอบการสะกดและบริบทไทยแบบละเอียด ครบทุกจุด

* สรุปผลไว สนุก และเข้าใจง่าย : ระบบให้คะแนนพร้อมแนะนำแบบเข้าใจง่าย สนุก เหมือนมีพ่อขุนรามคำแหงมาคอยติวส่วนตัว

* ใช้งานง่ายในคลิกเดียว : เลือกเฟรม/ข้อความ แล้วคลิกเดียวจบ ไม่ต้องเสียเวลาย้ายแพลตฟอร์ม

* ประหยัดเวลาทำงานจริง : ไม่ต้องเช็กทีละคำ ตรวจจบในรอบเดียว พร้อมใช้งานทันที


🎯 เหมาะกับใคร

* UX Writer สาย Copy ไทย

* ทีม Marketing ที่สร้าง Content ไทย

* Designer/ทีม Product ที่ต้องการงานไทยไร้ที่ติใน Figma


🚀 เริ่มใช้งานง่ายสุด ๆ

1. เลือกข้อความที่ต้องการเช็ก

2. เปิด Plugin “Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered)” ใน Figma

3. รับผลตรวจและคำแนะนำทันที! ทำให้การเช็กภาษาไทยไม่ใช่เรื่องน่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป


เพียงคลิกเดียว งานภาษาไทยของคุณจะไร้ที่ติ ดูมืออาชีพ และประหยัดเวลากว่าที่เคย!
plugins.tagline: เช็คการสะกดภาษาไทยด้วย AI แบบสนุกๆ สไตล์พ่อขุนรามคำแหง พร้อมให้คะแนนแบบโบราณ

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

133539.name: Hints
133539.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access Alibaba Cloud for AI naming, and the Qwen proxy (deployed and local) for AI features.

133539.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

plugins.name: BorderBuddy
plugins.description:
Quickly inspect and update border radius values across selected frames in Figma.

BorderBuddy helps you speed up your workflow by displaying the current border radius of elements inside a selected frame, allowing you to adjust all values at once with a single click. Perfect for cleaning up inconsistent UI or testing design variations.
plugins.tagline: Quickly view and update the border radius of all elements within a selected frame in Figma.

133137.name: BorderBuddy
133137.description:
Quickly inspect and update border radius values across selected frames in Figma.

BorderBuddy helps you speed up your workflow by displaying the current border radius of elements inside a selected frame, allowing you to adjust all values at once with a single click. Perfect for cleaning up inconsistent UI or testing design variations.
133137.tagline: Quickly view and update the border radius of all elements within a selected frame in Figma.

plugins.name: Get Image Type
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that analyzes your selected images and reveals their file formats with a single click. Stop guessing if that asset is a JPG, PNG, SVG, or WebP.


Does not support:

  1. Video/Movie Files: This plugin does not support identification of video or movie formats.


Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.

accepted.name: Farren Wang
accepted.description: Farren's Figma account. Here you'll find stuff she's proud of.

plugins.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

136900.name: Get Image Type
136900.description:
A simple plugin that analyzes your selected images and reveals their file formats with a single click. Stop guessing if that asset is a JPG, PNG, SVG, or WebP.


Does not support:

  1. Video/Movie Files: This plugin does not support identification of video or movie formats.


Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.
136900.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

131062.name: Quick Navigator
131062.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
131062.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: JSON -> Swatches
plugins.description:
Turn JSON into color swatches in Figma sorted by color.


Each swatch includes the color name (if given) as well as Hex and opacity values.


You can add an optional tag for extra detail if/when importing multiple libraries.


Auditing an existing design system? JSON -> Swatches is a great tool for mapping old color libraries to new.
plugins.tagline: Turn JSON into Color Swatches in Figma

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

126253.name: Sticky Note Maker
126253.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.

How to Use:

126253.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: SafeToSell - Trademark checker
plugins.description:
SafeToSell helps digital product creators, print-on-demand sellers, and e-commerce designers automatically scan their designs for active trademarks and forbidden keywords.


Simply select text elements from your Figma frame, and the plugin will instantly validate if they’re safe to sell on popular platforms like Etsy, Shopify, Printify, and more.


---


✅ Instant trademark scan

✅ Detect banned phrases before you publish

✅ Avoid copyright strikes, takedowns, or store bans

✅ Built for POD, digital goods, and e-commerce sellers


---


Whether you're designing T-shirts, wall art, digital downloads, or listing mockups, SafeToSell gives you peace of mind that your text won’t get flagged or removed.


Don’t risk losing your store — scan it before you sell it.
plugins.tagline: Instantly check your designs for trademarks and banned phrases before uploading.

plugins.name: Postcard Generator Experiment
plugins.description:
This plugin is a study project for the Generative AI course at the Innopolis University.


It tries it's best to generate greeting cards by combining layout generation, user-uploaded photos, a custom AI-generated poem and a thematic AI-generated background.


To run, get a token at an https://openrouter.ai and place it as the only text block on an empty page.


For help feel free to write me at levada.andrew@gmail.com


Github — https://github.com/andrewlevada/postcard-generator-experiment
plugins.tagline: A study project: a couple of llm's trying their best to design

plugins.name: Guru Guides
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that delivers UX guidelines and customisable content, seamlessly integrating design system guides into Figma workflows.


Read the article


Guideline customisation

Connect Contentful to Guru Guides to customise guidelines for your organisation, tailoring them to specific projects, components, or patterns.


Watch the walkthrough


Default guidelines

Guru Guides offers default guidelines to help novice designers master modern web design by adopting essential components and best practices.


Benefits

Explore how consistent design principles enhance user experience, ensure brand alignment, and streamline team collaboration.
plugins.tagline: Customisable UX guidelines for Figma. Connect Contentful or use defaults to streamline design.

We’ve added a new Compositions section to the plugin!
This area showcases real-world examples of components in use — practical, contextual, and grounded in actual UI scenarios.

Use it to explore how components behave beyond variants and see them in action across different interface patterns.

plugins.name: Turtles
plugins.description:
Turtles is a simple utility to that selects every layer under your selected layer. When working on mobile UI this is a cumbersome task. No more!


  1. Select a layer
  2. Run "Turtles"
  3. You're done! Everything below is selected ✌️
plugins.tagline: Select "All The Way Down

Private Unicode characters

Symbol-only texts (e.g., ©, ®, ™, ♥)
132876.tagline: Integrate your localization with Figma using the Tarjim.io figma plugin

plugins.name: OxyReIcon
plugins.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning – let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
plugins.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

103926.name: OxyReIcon
103926.description:

Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. 103926.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

plugins.name: Paste Large Images
plugins.description:
Stop wasting time saving huge reference screenshots to disk—just paste or import them directly into your file, at full quality.


What it does

  1. 🥸 Paste or select file: Use ⌘ + V / Ctrl + V or click “select file” to bring in any image.
  2. 🔪 Smart slicing: Large images are automatically chopped into Figma-friendly tiles, so you never lose resolution.
  3. 🚀 Instant placement: Your screenshot drops right into view, wrapped in a frame or a group—no extra steps, no quality loss.
plugins.tagline: Instantly paste or insert high-resolution screenshots into Figma

136944.name: Paste Large Images
136944.description:

  2. 🔪 Smart slicing: Large images are automatically chopped into Figma-friendly tiles, so you never lose resolution.
  3. 🚀 Instant placement: Your screenshot drops right into view, wrapped in a frame or a group—no extra steps, no quality loss.
136944.tagline: Instantly paste or insert high-resolution screenshots into Figma

plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions
136052.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: Variables Management
plugins.description:
This plugin remaps variables between libraries inside the Figma variable table.


It’s useful when working with two connected libraries. If both libraries are duplicated for a new project, then the libraries remain connected to the original libraries.


This plugin can automatically remap those variable connections with a new library.


Currently it's maping the variables inside Figma's variable table only.

accepted.name: Moon Design System (Public)
accepted.description: Moon is a complete design system built to help product teams across the world build better digital experiences.

plugins.tagline: Variables management for Figma libraries

135544.name: Variables Management
135544.description:

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

135187.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
135187.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.
135187.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

plugins.name: Image Compressor FREE
plugins.description:
A small but mighty Figma plugin that helps you compress and replace images right inside your designs.

Simply select one or more image layers — or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout — this tool does one job well and doesn’t get in your way.
plugins.tagline: image compression, export, lightweight, jpeg, optimization, size, nested images, size, png, jpg

134694.name: Image Compressor FREE
134694.description:
A small but mighty Figma plugin that helps you compress and replace images right inside your designs.

Simply select one or more image layers — or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout — this tool does one job well and doesn’t get in your way.
134694.release_notes:
Version 1.0.0 – Initial Release
Features:

🔹 Compress and replace image fills with optimized JPEGs

🔹 Adjustable compression quality (10–100)

🔹 Option to search nested images inside frames and groups

🔹 Multilingual interface (9 languages supported)

🔹 Clear visual report: before / after size & savings

🔹 Result compression bar with color feedback
134694.tagline: image compression, export, lightweight, jpeg, optimization, size, nested images, size, png, jpg

plugins.name: Promptus
plugins.description:
Promptus is a free Figma plugin that turns text or images into high-quality AI image prompts—all in just seconds, without leaving Figma.


⸻


Available tools

•Text-to-Prompt – type a brief and receive a detailed prompt

•Image-to-Prompt – upload an image and extract the underlying prompt

•One-Click Copy – copy the ready-to-use prompt wherever you need


⸻


Set up your Google Gemini API key in Promptus:


Open Promptus inside Figma.

Click the gear icon (Settings) in the top-right corner of the plugin panel.

Go to Google AI Studio.

Click “Sign in to Google AI Studio” and authenticate with your Google account.

In the top header, click the “Get API Key” button.

When prompted, click “Create API key”.

In the project pop-up, enter a project name (or select an existing one) and confirm.


Thank you for choosing Promptus! 🤩

👉 If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know — your feedback makes all the difference.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate detailed AI image prompts in Figma

134938.description:
